sections.paragraph: + The daughter of Dibri, of the tribe of Dan. (Leviticus 24:11) + The daughter of Zerubbabel. (1 Chronicles 3:19) (B.C. after 536.) + Chief of the Izharites. (1 Chronicles 23:18) + A descendant of Eliezer the son of Moses, in the reign of David. (1 Chronicles 26:25,26,28) (B.C. 1013.) + A Gershonite. (1 Chronicles 23:9) + One whose sons returned from Babylon with Ezra. (Ezra 8:10)
